modName: Mysti's Blades of Pain and Suffering
summary: Pain and Suffering what more for the Stealthy destructive type eh?
descriptionHtml:
Mysti's Daggers of Pain and Suffering! 

What better way for a Custom NPC then a couple of Custom Blades for Mysti. 

Located in the Raggered Flaggon in Riften, Located on a one of the crates. 

Simply Pick up, and trade with Mysti to equip them. 
When in combat she will Duel Wield as well and watch the pain and suffering happen upon your foes! 

*Note* You wont get in much trouble when you pick them up, no one seems to care in the fallgon, despite having the word STEAL come up, Come on, their a bunch of theives themself. 

I recommend using this with my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56678/?]Mysti Companion Mod[/url], you can however use these for your own, however Mysti wont be happy and may hunt you down for her blades! 

Happy Killing 

I recommend downloading as well [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13571/?]Duel Wielding Mod[/url]﻿ just incase The update for Mysti isn't being nice on it's own!

Update 1.1 - It was revealed that Mysti's daggers were forged by a underground blacksmith that didnt follow Skyrims Code of Conduct in regarding to the Blacksmithing Mangmenting Code, Section 1, Paragraph 4 - All Blades must be crafted to show reasonable cause of damage. 

Mysti's blades attack power has been reduced to 1k damage a piece, with crit damage at 800 a piece 

They are still "Powerful" in their own way!
author: Romire
